method.name: Prototype weigthed classifie

reference.ref: R. Paredes, E. Vidal. Learning weighted metrics to minimize nearest-neighbor classification error. IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence 28:7 (2006) 1100-1110.

generalDescription.objective: To perform a classification task by means of a weighting scheme.
generalDescription.howWork: A method of weights extraction associated to prototypes, with the aim of enhancing the classification accuracy of the 1-NN rule

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: Clas-PW Dataset: iris (10 fold cross validation run) Training set: iris-10-1tra.dat to iris-10-10tra.dat Test set: iris-10-1tst.dat to iris-10-10tst.dat Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: default values
